title: When to publish code as open source - impact

content.question: A programmer is developing Java code that can be used to analyze a data file. In which of the following situations would it be best for the programmer to publish the code as open source?

choices.label: When the programmer wants to enable other programmers to modify the code for inclusion in their programs
When the programmer wants to ensure that attributes are encapsulated
When the programmer wants to prevent others from sharing the code
When the programmer wants to require other programmers to purchase the code

content.answer: When the programmer wants to enable other programmers to modify the code for inclusion in their programs

skill.text: 5.A: Explain how computing impacts society, economy, and culture.
